attributes.action: scrap this petition system as it is a joke
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition system is another Blair waste of money.

The petitions on here are of little value or merit. The Phil Collins statue petition is testament to that.

The responses to these petitions are what? "We know best - shut up", "please go and moan at someone else" it is daft, also pointless. It is simply keeping some other overpaid monkey in a job.

Supposedly, 200 signatures will prompt said monkey to actually look at the petition - get it signed.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
